encode

public byte[] encode(java.lang.String password)
              throws CryptoUtilsException
Encodes this RSAPrivateKey object as a base64 encoded byte array using PEM with password protection

Parameters:

Throws:

decode

public static RSAPrivateKey decode(byte[] keyBytes,
                                   java.lang.String password)
                            throws CryptoUtilsException
Decodes a byte array encoded using base64 to an RSAPrivateKey object

Parameters:
keyBytes - Base64 encoded byte array representing the key
password - Password used for encoding the key
Returns:
A new RSAPrivateKey that correspond to the encoded bytes
Throws:
CryptoUtilsException - if the byte array does not correspond to a Base64 RSAPrivateKey encoded key
